member.name: M:JetBrains.dotCover.ConsoleRunner.Impl.Commands.SnapshotFilesEnumerationUtil.GetIndexFiles(System.String)
member.summary: Returns list of index files based on the specified source. Method introduced in order to support both new and old-style source data specification.
member.param: snapshot index file or coverage results descriptor (in previous versions: xml-file containing list of index files obtained during coverage session)
